skins.selfIntroduction: Heyoooo! The name's SeattleC Err, I don't technically have a real name, but just call me Seattle! Seriously, don't sweat the small stuff! Anyhow, I was one of the prototypes for the Worcester class, and as an improvement on the Atlanta class, AA is my A-game! Just leave anything with wings to me!
skins.acquisition: Sup! You the one who woke me up? Alrighty then~ The name's Seattle! Nice meeting you!
skins.login: You eat yet, Commander? If not, would you like me to whip something up real quick?
skins.details: I've got a party, tea time, girls meetup, and drinking get-together to attend... Okay! My schedule is PACKED! Guess that's not really a bad thing, though!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Hey, Commander... Isn't it kinda lonely with just one secretary? Whaddya say we liven it up and get some more peeps in here?
skins.secretaryIdle2: You free once you're done with work today, Commander? Listen, I'm throwing a cool party later! You can drop by any time if you want!
skins.secretaryIdle3: I've got zilch combat experience on paper, but with everyone teaching me stuff, I'll catch up in no time!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, you wanna do some dance practice? You'll rise on the girls' popularity lists if you can dance well!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Listen, if you did that on purpose, then consider my gears grinded!

skins.shipDescription: Hey! Great to have you here, Commander! I've gotta ask, whaddya think of my dress? Looking real gorgeous, right? ...Phew, awesome! I was worried my dress didn't look nice and might be dragging down the party mood, that's all!
skins.acquisition: Hey! Great to have you here, Commander! I've gotta ask, whaddya think of my dress? Looking real gorgeous, right? ...Phew, awesome! I was worried my dress didn't look nice and might be dragging down the party mood, that's all!
skins.login: Hey! Welcome to my fabulous party, Commander! We're the life of the party tonight, you and I! Well, kinda.
skins.details: I dig how super-refined I look with this violin! It's not just for show though, I've got a little number for you! Check this out!
skins.secretaryIdle1: What kind of drink do ya want, Georgia? Ah, an Oxycola sour on the rocks? So the usual, then? You got it!
skins.secretaryIdle2: So like, you know parties are a group activity, right? Let's get you away from your drinking-alone corner and out in front of some friends!
skins.secretaryIdle3: I spy with my little eye a few peeps who don't party much... Just gimme a few minutes. I'm gonna go hit 'em up!
skins.secretaryTouch: What's your poison, Commander? There's always soft drinks if alcohol's outta your league.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eek! Hey pal, I think you might be a little tipsy there.

skins.shipDescription: Meeeerry Christmas~! Even though the party is about to start, as you can see, I'm still getting ready~ Just gimme a moment, all righty~?
skins.acquisition: Meeeerry Christmas~! Even though the party is about to start, as you can see, I'm still getting ready~ Just gimme a moment, all righty~?
skins.login: Yooo! Awesome! With your help, Commander, we're gonna speed through things twice as fast... no, three times!
skins.details: I've gotta show everyone who walks through these doors how passionate the Eagle Union is about our Christmas celebrations!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Georgia, the gingerbread you wanted is ready! There's a little surprise waiting for you!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hmm, let me think, what are we still missing...? Ah! A special Christmas tree that can immediately grab everyone's attention!
skins.secretaryIdle3: The holidays give us all a reason to get together and have a good time. As for me, I'm in charge of providing the best venue for that to happen!
skins.secretaryTouch: Pass the salt shaker this way! Thanks!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, now's not the time for that!

skins.JPClientName: サンフィッシュスペル！
skins.shipDescription: Supportive sorceress Seattle, comin' in hot! So, something got you down, my good pal? I'm up to talk about whatever's on your mind, but in return, you've gotta come to my party tonight!
skins.acquisition: Supportive sorceress Seattle, comin' in hot! So, something got you down, my good pal? I'm up to talk about whatever's on your mind, but in return, you've gotta come to my party tonight!
skins.login: You wanna go for a dive too, Commander? Aight, then I'll be your buddy diver!
skins.details: I've got a game tournament by noon and barbecue in the evening. Having so much on my schedule makes me a happy gal!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Come on, Cheshire! Stop messing around and gimme a hand! You too, Georgia! Chop-chop!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Bremerton's a real cool gal! You should totally hit her up if you need life advice or if you run into trouble at the party!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Boy, I tell ya, I just love the beach! We gotta work extra hard so everyone can have a good time here!
skins.secretaryTouch: Remember to keep a real tight hold on my hand, Commander!
